questions.question: In Tic-Tac-Toe, if we don't use depth as parameter while mapping to graph, then which of the follwoing will be true?

answers.b: We will terminate quickly as compared to when we use depth

questions.question: Alpha beta pruning is used for?

answers.a: Reducing number of nodes that are considered
answers.c: Mostly useful when large number of states such as in chess

questions.question: What is the main disadvantage of the Minimax algorithm?

answers.a: It is computationally intensive for large game trees
answers.b: It does not guarantee finding the optimal solution
answers.d: It only works for zero-sum games

explanations.a: The Minimax algorithm can be computationally intensive for large game trees, which can make it impractical to use for some games.

questions.question: What is the main advantage of using a Minimax tree in game theory?

answers.a: It guarantees finding the optimal solution
answers.b: It is computationally efficient for large game trees
answers.c: It is easier to implement than other algorithms
answers.d: It works well for non-zero-sum games

explanations.a: A Minimax tree guarantees finding the optimal solution in game theory, as it considers all possible moves and outcomes.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of the Minimax algorithm for a complete tree where n is the number of moves?

explanations.d: The time complexity of the Minimax algorithm for a complete game tree is O(2^n), where n is the number of moves in the game.
